channel.title: Cases for Add Name, Del Name, and more?
channel.description:
Well, I've recently been wanting to make a 'spellbook' out of the Ignore List.
Is it possible to do all of this [b]SERVER SIDE[/b]?
[ul][li]Put sendQuest text where the names would be on the Ignore List[/li] [li]Make the "names" (sendQuest text) perform actions, which means using cases[/li][/ul]
I would like to know which one of these are server-side, hopefully they all are. And I would also like to know if anybody here knows the cases, or IDs for sendQuests for the above.
So I need these: Case for Add Name on Ignore List Case for Del Name on Ignore List Cases for the Names (in my case the sendQuest text) on the Ignore List IDs for the Names (sendQuest IDs, which are sendFrame126 IDs)
Hope you guys can help!
I have all the IDs, and changed them already. I just dont know the cases.

item.title: Cases for Add Name, Del Name, and more?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Fir3 Flam3:

That’s not what he’s asking.

True that. Those kind of posts are annoying Legend, no offence :S

But yeah, my Music Tab is Occupied with something, and so is my Quest Tab. So does anybody here know the Case Numbers for the Add Name, Del Name buttons on the Ignore List? And is it possible to sendQuest text into the name spaces on the Ignore List, and make the “names” perform actions? If so do you know the interace IDs for those and the case numbers for those as well? Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Cases for Add Name, Del Name, and more?

Well, I’ve recently been wanting to make a ‘spellbook’ out of the Ignore List.
